input.sentences: a seafood dinner was planned to celebrate a special occasion .
everyone pitched in to help prepare the meal .
they sat at the table to enjoy the feast .
there was a birthday cake for the guest of honor .
being typical males | some of the guys took a nap while the women cleaned up .
output.sentences: Our beginning of summer clambake is ready to go.
Friends,neighbors,relatives are all invited to gather round.
After consuming each and every steamer and lobster we sat around the table and shared stories
It was Fred's birthday and he was pleased and surprised we remembered the cake.
What an exhausting day for one of my guests.
